price: 11. Kinnih immay yok meesittam kak faxxintam umaanet caddok tatureeh, isi nafsi yudlume mara, tohuk lakal uma taamal meqe taama ciggiilise mari kak conxitam maliiy, toysa diggah anu dambi cabti-li xuwaw-li kinniyo iyye Yalli.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسۡنَۢا بَعۡدَ سُوٓءٖ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā man ẓalama thumma baddala ḥus'nan baʿda sūin fa-innī ghafūrun raḥīmun
